item.title: ECRID INC 10-K
item.description: ECRID INC, which is in the Miscellaneous Food Preparations & Kindred Products [2090] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 12, 2022 had 10887 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 134 instances stock - 133 instances financial - 126 instances ecrid - 115 instances may - 105 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
